-- Select database
USE nyc_taxi_discovery


-- Selecting from file
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green


-- Selecting all csv files from a folder (with wildcard)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green


-- Selecting all files from a subfolder (with wildcard)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green


-- Selecting more than one file (but not all files in a folder)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
            'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green


-- Using more than one wildcard character
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green


-- Using file metadata filename() function
SELECT
    trip_data_green.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green
GROUP BY 
    trip_data_green.filename()
ORDER BY
    trip_data_green.filename()



-- Limit data using filename() function
SELECT
    trip_data_green.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green
WHERE
    trip_data_green.filename() 
IN
    ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY 
    trip_data_green.filename()
ORDER BY
    trip_data_green.filename()


-- Using filepath() function
SELECT
    trip_data_green.filepath(1) AS year,
    trip_data_green.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green
WHERE
    trip_data_green.filename() 
IN
    ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY 
    trip_data_green.filepath(1),
    trip_data_green.filepath(2)
ORDER BY
    trip_data_green.filepath(1),
    trip_data_green.filepath(2)
    

-- Using filepath() function in the WHERE clause
-- Good for performance and to only read the required amount of data and reduce costs
SELECT
    trip_data_green.filepath(1) AS year,
    trip_data_green.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS trip_data_green
WHERE
    trip_data_green.filepath(1) = '2020'
AND
    trip_data_green.filepath(2) IN ('06', '07', '08')
GROUP BY 
    trip_data_green.filepath(1),
    trip_data_green.filepath(2)
ORDER BY
    trip_data_green.filepath(1),
    trip_data_green.filepath(2)
